Battera::

She dreamed that her two friends were now dead and thier rotting 
corpses were in cages that hung in front of her and Hell Beast.  Hell 
Beast was tugging on the lease that was attached to her collar.  Hell 
Beast laughed evilly as she cried, mourning the loss of her 
friends.  "YOu have caused me no end of trouble, you conspired with 
others to go against me."  She spoke between sobs,"I didn't. I fled 
like a coward, but I didn't raise a hand against you."
He laughed,"Of course not. I never gave you the chance. Now you will 
pay for your crimes."  She cried and looked up at him,"You already 
have hurt more than youu could ever know just by hurting my friends."

She cried in her sleep.

Hell Beast laughed and drew out a red hot sword and started to touch 
her with the hot blade. It burned and seered the skin. She screamed 
out in pain and tried to get away from him.  He only pulled her 
towards him and burned her again with the hot blade. "You will stay 
in the pit with me for eternity.  you shall endure more pain and 
suffering than anyone.  I shall enjoy hearing you scream and plead 
for your miserable life. But then, if your here, you must be dead."
She screamed out,"NOOOOOOOO!!!!" as Hell Beast laughed at her.  

She muttered in her sleep,"noooo."

Then Hell Beast started to change and morph into something else.  It 
was Vulios.  He sneered at her and pulled hard on the leash.  She 
fell to the ground before him.  "You weak, sniveling, whimpering 
worm. You left me to die at Hell Beast's hands and didn't even try to 
save me. Now you will pay for your cowardess."  He raised up a large 
cannon and shot her. She fell to the ground and gasped for breath.  
She cried and looked up at Vulios, who now looked very 
demonic. "Please, Vulios, I din't mean to...I..I.." she tried to 
catch her breath, but he fired again.

Her body twitched and she muttered in her sleep,"vulios..no.."
Her head jerked at the same time she got shot in her dream. 




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "David Torrey" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::CyberShark::
> 
>     He ran up to Battera when she called his name. He held her with 
his only hand. (His other is a blade) He looked at her. Then he 
looked a Vulois, they both seemed to be having nightmares. He 
wondered if he should pull the plug.
